mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart_item (cart_id, ino, count) VALUES (#{cart_id}, #{ino}, #{count})
mapper.select: SELECT ci.cart_id, ci.cart_item_id, i.ino, i.item_nm, i.price, ci.count, ii.imgUrl AS rep_img_url FROM cart_item ci JOIN item i ON ci.ino = i.ino LEFT JOIN item_img ii ON i.ino = ii.ino AND ii.repImgYn = 'y' WHERE ci.cart_id = #{cart_id};
